quiz.title: What do you know about Malaria?
quiz.welcometext: Malaria is a very serious issues in many countries. Test your knowledge!
quiz.question: How many countries does Malaria occur in? 100 50 10 200
In 2010 more than 200 Million people suffered from Malaria True False

ChildFund prevents Malaria by providing communities by Providing Insecticide treated Mosquito Nets Providing Training and Education of Leaders on Malaria Prevention Providing Focus on the most vulnerable: Pregnant Women, households headed by children and Grandparents and the disabled All of the above
Malaria is the leading cause of death in children in Zambia True False
Most Malaria deaths occur in children under 5 years old True False
